divs: sighting detailsat 4:35am, march 30, 2008, i witnessed on my way to work just staring at the sky while travelling south bound on highway 37\interstate 69 just north of 96th street (approx. ��� mile) in the indianapolis\fishers (in) area an unusual light pattern. i first thought this may have been an electrical occurrence in some power lines, but realised that there are no power lines on my route. the light was a low intensity, translucent, white to very light blue in color, and oblong in shape. the size was similar to that of a beach ball, maybe a little bigger. the light rapidly moved north at my guess of 100+mph perpendicular to the outside shoulder of the northbound lanes; its altitude was approximately 30��� above the ground. i saw no object related to the light, but the light seemed to pulse\flash at every length of its width in travel, a very rapid pulse considering the speed that i surmised. i tried to keep view of the object, but travelling at 60mph myself and crossing a lane inadvertently (then trying to regain my control of my vehicle) i lost sight of the light. this all seemed to last no more than 3-4 seconds of me witnessing it.
Summary: pulsating light in the Indianapolis, IN area
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Fishers
There were no other sightings in Fishers on or around March 30th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
